string.value: #b#@1092004:##k in #b#m120000200##k has a favor to ask of you.

He says the powder generated from #rOrange Mushrooms#k gets him sleepy.
He has asked you to hunt 30 #rOrange Mushrooms#k.
#rOrange Mushrooms#k can be easily found in #b#m100030000##k.

Report back to #b#@1092004:##k in #b#m120000200##k.
You have eliminated 30 #rOrange Mushrooms#k for #b#p1092004##k the sleepyhead.
I'm so sleepy these days. I know I'm always sleepy, but do you think maybe #b#p1090000##k was right?

You know the #rOrange Mushrooms#k? She say that they sprinkle orange powder every time they move, and the powder causes drowsiness on humans when we come in contact with it. \nI don't know it's true or not, but will you help me anyway?
You'll easily find #rOrange Mushrooms#k in #b#m100030000##k.\nCould you eliminate 30 of them? I think that would help me wake up and stay alert.
I know dedicating your precious time to a stranger is a tough thing to do.
Have you eliminated all the #rOrange Mushrooms#k already?\nI'm not sleepy anymore! Really!
#b#p1090000##k was right!\nI can finally stay awake and get my job done. Thank you so much!
